lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: She said, "If Im not gonna be happy getting married somewhere that we find in a day, well then we should just postpone it."

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Postpone it? Emily, do you think Monica realises how much our parents spent on this wedding? Do you my sisters teeny-tiny little brain comprehends that people took time out of their lives to fly thousands of miles to be here, huh?  This isnt right.

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: I realize that people are going to be disappointed. But, Im sure theyll come back when we can do it right.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I cant ask people to do that? Would you ask people to do that?

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: Dont you point your pants at me!  We have no choice! Anywhere thats half-decent wouldve be booked months ago, Ross dont you understand? This is our wedding Im talking about.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: The only thing I understand is; postponing it is not an option. This is when were getting married.

lines.text: Well, thanks, we like him.

lines.speaker: drunk man
lines.text: My god!! You must have been a teenage when you had him.

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: Theres no way in hell, Im paying for it.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Look, were down to just one point. Could we please, maybe just settle it after the wedding.

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: All-right fine, but I just want to say, Im not paying for your wine cellar. You thieving, would be speaking German if it werent for us, cheap little man.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: The guy was hammered, okay? Theres no way, you look like Rosss mother.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Then why would he say it?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Because hes crazy. Okay? He came up to me earlier and thanked me for my very moving performance in Titanic.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh, my mothers right. Im never going to get married.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Ahh, you know what? That is....Who wouldnt want you?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Ohh, Please?! Im a single mom, with a thirty year old son!!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hi, Im back. Listen, I need to...

lines.speaker: ticket agent
lines.text: Hello.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Hello. I need to get on the 11 o'clock flight.

lines.speaker: ticket agent
lines.text: Oh Im afraid that plane has already pulled away from the gate.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Okay, you know what/ Youre going to have to call that plane and tell them to swing around and come and pick me up.

lines.speaker: ticket agent
lines.text: I cant do that.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Sure, you know what? Come on, well just tell them that there was like a problem with like the "engine".

lines.speaker: ticket agent
lines.text: Im afraid Im going to have to ask you to step aside, Miss.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Look, If I dont get to London!! He is going to marry that other girl!!!

lines.speaker: ticket agent
lines.text: I cant imagine why.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: All right, you know what? I am not leaving here, until you call that plane back!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Im getting married today!! Whoo-hoo!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Morning, Ross.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Im getting married, to..day!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yeah you are!!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Ahh, whoo-hoo!!(He runs back out the door.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Do you think he knew I was here?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Well Ive-Ive never done that with you before.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Nope.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: So, ahh, how are ya? How ya...How ya... You okay?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Yep, yep...You?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Yes...Yes..Uh-huh, You? We did you.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well...Id better get going.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh yea yea, absolutely.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Could you not look?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: I dont want to look.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ohhh.

lines.speaker: passenger
lines.text: Ahh, ahh, excuse me.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.speaker: passenger
lines.text: If youre planning on doing that throughout the entire flight. Please tell me now. So that I could that a sedative...or perhaps slip you one.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Oh. Im sorry. Im very sorry. Sorry.  Its just, Im ahh, Im kinda excited. Im, ahh, going to London to ahh, tell this guy that I love him and...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hello?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Hey, were the hell have you been?!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey. I spent the night out. I met this cute bridesmaid. She is so...

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I dont want to hear about her!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Ahh Pheebs, you know youre still my number one girl.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No! No, we have an emergency. Okay? Rachels coming to London.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Ohh great!!!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No its not great. No, shes coming to tell Ross that she loves him.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: But, he loves Emily?

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: I KNOW THAT!!! You have to stop her!! Shes going to ruin the wedding!!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: All right, so, okay...

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hold on. Hold on.  Rachel coming. Do...Something.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Okay, so Im done my part, okay. Its your responsibility now, okay. The burden is off me, right?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Right!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: So tell me about this girl?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Hey.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Have you seen Monica?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Im not seeing Monica.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Look weve got to find her. Phoebe just called!! Rachels coming to tell Ross she loves him!!

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: I know! Thats why we got to find Monica!! You know where she is?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: No!! Okay!! Whats with the third degree?! Why dont you just shine a light in my eyes?!

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: ...And so then I realized. All this stuff I had been doing. proposing to Joshua, lying to Ross about why I couldnt come to the wedding. Was all just a way of...

lines.speaker: passenger
lines.text: Oh, oh oh!! Im sorry, can I interrupt? You know I just want to say..That you are a horrible, horrible person.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Ehh, pardon me?

lines.speaker: passenger
lines.text: You say you love this man, yet youre about to ruin the happiest day of his life. Im afraid I have to agree with you friend Pheebs.. This is a..this is a...terrible, terrible plan.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: But he has to know how I feel!

lines.speaker: passenger
lines.text: But why? He loves this...this Emily person. No good can come of this.

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well I-I think your wrong.

lines.speaker: passenger
lines.text: Oh-no.And by the way, it seems to be perfectly clear that you were on a break.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Oh my God! Its like a fairyland.

lines.speaker: mrs. waltham
lines.text: I know, its horrible isnt it?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Well, I love it. I only hope my wedding looks this good.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: I just hope...

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: You can let some of them go by!

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Pisst, Monica. Alright, we really need to start looking out for Rachel. Ill cover the front door. You watch that big hole at the back of the building and I got Chandler covering Ross.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Why would I care where Chandler is? You know uhh...You know sometimes I dont even like Chandler.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Okay.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I do. I do. I do.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Oh yea, your right. Its the second one.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Really?

lines.speaker: felicity
lines.text: Hello Joey.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Hey, Felicity.

lines.speaker: felicity
lines.text: Umm, I thought about you all day.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.speaker: felicity
lines.text: Um-hum. Talk New York to me again.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Fuggetaboutit.  How you doin?

lines.speaker: felicity
lines.text: Mmm.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.speaker: mrs. geller
lines.text: Theres nothing to discuss. Were not paying for your wine cellar.

lines.speaker: mr. waltham
lines.text: You-you have to meet me in the middle here.

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: Hey, you keep pushing me on this, my foots going to meet the middle of your ass.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Dad!!

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: What-whats going on?!

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Nothing, nothing. Everything's under control.

lines.speaker: mr. waltham
lines.text: You want a piece of me, sir? Is that what your saying?  You want a piece of me?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Okay! Okay! Thats it!! Parents!! Parents!! Back away!! All right, this is our wedding day!   From now on everyone gets along, and if I hear one more word. NO GRANDCHILDREN!  Thats right!!

lines.speaker: mr. geller
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.speaker: mr. waltham
lines.text: Sorry old boy, sorry. Sorry. Sorry.  I could kill you with my thumb, you know.

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: What was all that about?

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: It was...This disagreement over... My god. You...you look beautiful.

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: Ohh... Oh! You were not meant to see me before the wedding. Its bad luck.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: You know what, I think weve had all the bad luck were going to have.

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: My God. Rachel!  Your here. I cant believe it.  What happen? Why are you here?

lines.speaker: rachel
lines.text: Well I just came... I just needed to tell you... Congratulations.

lines.speaker: mrs. waltham
lines.text: Hello, Waltham Interiors.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Mrs. Waltham. Hi. Its Phoebe again.

lines.speaker: mrs. waltham
lines.text: Why?!

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Yea. Can I please, please, please talk to one of the best men? This is going to be the last time I promise.

lines.speaker: mrs. waltham
lines.text: Joey theres a girl on the phone for you.

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Ohh great!!  Hello.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Did you stop Rachel?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No, but its okay. She just came in and gave him a hug, that it.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: So nothing got ruined?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: No.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: Oh thats so great! Ohh, so whats going on now?

lines.speaker: joey
lines.text: Ah, Im-Im walking down the aisle...Still walking.  Im about to pass the bridesmaid I hooked up with last night.  Hey!  I told her "Hey." And now Im at the front with Ross. Its Phoebe.  He looks pretty mad. Uh...Id better go.

lines.speaker: phoebe
lines.text: No!! wait, wait, wait!! Oh please, hold it up so I can listen.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: What we did last night was....

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Stupid.

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Totally crazy stupid.

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: What were we thinking?

lines.speaker: chandler
lines.text: Im coming over tonight though, right?

lines.speaker: monica
lines.text: Oh yeah. Definitely.

lines.speaker: minister
lines.text: Friends. Family. We are gathered to celebrate here today the joyous union of Ross and Emily. May the happiness we share with them today be with them always. Now Emily, repeat after me. I, Emily...

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: I, Emily...

lines.speaker: minster
lines.text: Take thee Ross...

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: Take thee Ross...

lines.speaker: minster
lines.text: As my lawfully wedded husband, in sickness and in health, till death parts us.

lines.speaker: emily
lines.text: As my lawfully wedded husband, in sickness and in health, until death parts us.

lines.speaker: minster
lines.text: Now Ross, repeat after me. I Ross...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: I Ross...

lines.speaker: minister
lines.text: Take thee, Emily...

lines.speaker: ross
lines.text: Take thee, Rachel... Emily.  Emily.

lines.speaker: minister
lines.text: Uhh...Shall I go on?
